channel.title: How to add shops to a 317?
channel.description: Could someone tell me how to do this, or give me a link to a tut?' -thanks PS: I used search bar, didnt find anything.

item.title: How to add shops to a 317?
item.dc:creator: @blk_joe12 blk joe12
item.description:
@blk_joe12 wrote:

well first of all you have to make sure you have the npc model ids for the shops and than the rest has to do with adding the id of the npc to autospawn cfg make sure its not a npc tht is atkable and than there should be a shops.cfg and add it into along with the ids of the item you would like in the store:\ that is all you have to do. but i would edit one of the already made shops:\

Read full topic
item.source: How to add shops to a 317?
